Entry.Definition: The SIP constitutes a new submission not previously delivered to the repository.
The SIP supplements a previous submission by adding new or complementary information.
The SIP fully replaces a previous submission, typically correcting or updating its content.
The SIP is submitted for testing purposes only and must not result in the creation of an AIP.
The SIP contains the same set of content files as a previous submission, but includes one or more files with updated versions.
A request from the Producer for the OAIS to delete an existing AIP from the repository.
The SIP has a status that does not match any of the predefined values in this vocabulary.
